subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Both the Rangers, who are 4-0 at home in Game 7’s in team history, and the Capitals, who beat the Bruins in a Game 7 in the first round, are ready for Saturday’s decisive game.
snippet: Both the Rangers, who are 4-0 at home in Game 7’s in team history, and the Capitals, who beat the Bruins in a Game 7 in the first round, are ready for Saturday’s decisive game.
